sentences: Benny found a big blue balloon in the park.
It floated high and shiny in the sun.
He held the string tight so it wouldn't fly away!
"Let's go on an adventure!" said Benny.
The balloon bobbed and bounced in the breeze.
It looked like it wanted to explore too!
They went past the pond with the quacking ducks.
The ducks thought the balloon was the moon!
Up a little hill they climbed together.
The wind blew and the balloon tugged hard.
Oh no! The balloon slipped from Benny's hand!
Up, up, up it went into the sky.
Benny watched it float away until it was just a dot.
He knew the balloon was having its own adventure now.
And tomorrow - he'd find a new one!
